alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 13 at 1:38PM EDT until further notice by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following counties, Broward and Miami-Dade. * WHEN...Until 330 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 138 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Miami, Hialeah, North Miami, North Miami Beach, Aventura, Sunny Isles Beach, Opa-Locka, Miami Shores, El Portal, Golden Glades, Pinewood, Ojus, Westview, West Little River, Gladeview, Bay Harbor Islands, Biscayne Park, Bal Harbour, Golden Beach and Fiu North Campus. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
